mapper.sql: id, order_id, product_id, num, unit, tax_price, tax_rate, tax_amount, amount,deleted
mapper.select: select esod.id, esod.order_id, esod.product_id, esod.num, esod.unit, esod.tax_price, esod.tax_rate, esod.tax_amount, esod.amount, ep.name productName, esod.product_batch_id, epb.batch_name from erp_sale_order_detail esod left join erp_product ep on ep.id = esod.product_id and ep.deleted = 0 left join erp_product_batch epb on epb.id = esod.product_batch_id and epb.deleted = 0 where esod.deleted = 0 and esod.order_id = #{orderId} order by esod.create_time desc

select esod.id, eso.company, eso.company_name, eso.contract_no, eso.customer, eso.customer_name, eso.sell_method, eso.contract_date, esod.unit, eso.id order_id, esod.num,eso.contract_quality_requirements, esod.tax_price, ep.id productId, ep.name productName, IFNULL(esod.product_batch_id,0) productBatchId, epb.batch_name from erp_sale_order eso left join erp_sale_order_detail esod on eso.id = esod.order_id and esod.deleted = 0 left join erp_product ep on ep.id = esod.product_id and ep.deleted = 0 left join erp_product_batch epb on epb.id = esod.product_batch_id and epb.deleted = 0 where eso.deleted = 0 and eso.id = #{orderId}
